H0.text: One element is present in the 20 compound sodium carbonate (Na₂CO₃).

H1.text: Three different elements are present in the 20‑atom sodium carbonate compound (Na₂CO₃).

H2.text: 6 is the number of different elements in the 20 compound sodium carbonate (Na₂CO₃).

H3.text: Seven is the number of different elements in the 20 compound sodium carbonate (Na₂CO₃).

A4.text: sodium carbonate (also known as washing soda, soda ash, sal soda, and soda crystals) is the inorganic compound with the formula Na2CO3.
